User: alright. I gotta go. ttyl!

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Oh hello. Long time no talk. How's the day going for yuo?
User: Very well, thanks for asking. How has your day been?
System: Getting better. I just recovered from a cold. I got wet in the rain last week. Are you planning anything for the holidays?
User: Glad to hear you're better. Sorry to hear you were sick. I was sick a couple of weeks ago with a bad cough. There's definitely a bug going around. Admit I just want to stay healthy for the holidays and plan to relax.
System: Oh same here. I think relaxing at home should be counted among the best ways to enjoy the holidays.
User: Definitely! I know a lot of folks travel for the holidays, but I'm happy to stay home myself!
System: I'm getting there. Every year until last year, I tried to go somewhere for the Christmas / New Year, and then I got bored traveling. lol not sure if that means I'm getting old?
User: Me too. Now I have folks come visit me for the holidays! But that's also tiresome..
System: Are you doing any home decorating then?
User: Yes! We set up an eco-friendly (i.e. fake) Christmas tree and put up some colorful LED lights which is very festive.
System: I think I'm copying you. Me and my wife plan to decorate and Christmas tree too. We bought most of the decorative stuffs from the stores, but haven't yet to buy the tree.
User: Buying a tree is a neat experience. I was torn between buying an artificial/eco-friendly/fake one vs. a real one that smells like fresh pine. In the end, we opted for the one that we can disassemble every year.
System: I see. Artificial anything is better, from tree to intelligence, huh?
User: Oh, very clever pun! I like it! Depends. I remember having real Christmas trees from childhood, but these days with climate change, I think not chopping down a tree just to decorate it and then throw it out in a month is the more responsible thing to do.
System: I see. It's probably also cheaper. I'll buy an artificial one too. Do you have any suggestions for the store?
User: Admit my favorite store is Target, plus they often have good deals.

System: hi
User: what are you up to?
System: code refactoring. you?
User: me? just chilling out at work. what is code refactoring?
System: good question. I don't even know what I am doing
User: haha, forget it. what else do you like to do beside work?
System: lots of fun stuff. eating sleeping :)
User: these are important things to do in life ;)
System: yeah. keep minimalist life style only do things you have to do :)
User: what food do you like to eat?
System: Asian food prefer spicy one
User: like Szechuan or Hunan? :)
System: yes yes yes! like that style. Do you like spicy food?
User: I like noodle soup like Pho or Ramen. I also like Beijing duck a lot!

System: Check the credits.

User: who?
System: . Spongebob Squarepants.

User: Admit my favorite store is Target, plus they often have good deals.

User: Admit my favorite store is Target, plus they often have good deals.
